subject: Standard format of contract to be entered into with DGR sponsored ex-servicemen for departmental collection of user fee
text: #Rdfy 7cflq <MHT wiferarvt Phona 91-11-26074100/25074200 Fax 91-11*25093507/26093514 (g6 3r UMTT Tu) Extn 2223/2318/24 68/2553 4' < National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 8, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/22/04-05/CMD-CO/DGR 13th 2004 CIRCWLAR_NO: NHAILCOMMERCLAL QPERATIONL4G Sub: Stendard format of contract to be entered into with  DGR sponsored ex-servicemen for departmental collection of user fee. In partial modification of Circular No. NHAI / COMMERCIAL OPERATION/ 14 dated 20.02.2003,` standard format of contract to be entered into with DGR sponsored ex-servicemen for collection of user enclosed with the icferced foircddoritenda stands superseded. Revised standard format of contract to be entered into with DGR sponsored ex-servicemen for  departmental collection of user fee is enclosed herewith, This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Ani (M M Lohia) General Manager (CO) To All PIUs/ CMUs to 1 All Members/ CGMs/ CVO 2 Al} GMs 3 PS to Chairman 4 Director General of Resettlement; Ministry of Defence; Govt  of India Librarian AART X 4 N+AAL Oct; fee, Copy
